summary: This module defines a set of classes that model individual test messages and various test outcomes (success, failure, skipped, timeout). The classes encapsulate attributes such as error codes, locations, severity, and textual descriptions, and provide methods for comparison, hashing, string representation, console display, and conversion to JUnit XML format. It also includes utilities for writing test results to JSON or plain‑text files and integrates with configuration, metadata, and display helpers used by the ansible‑test framework.
business_intent: Enable the ansible‑test framework to consistently capture, process, and report test execution results, facilitating clear console output, structured JUnit XML reports for CI pipelines, and persistent JSON/text logs for analysis and debugging.
